summary: Feature request to pass webpack object as second parameter to webpackConfigHook so users can access webpack plugins like DefinePlugin without importing webpack separately, avoiding potential version mismatches.
userImpact: Users currently need to import webpack directly to use webpack plugins, which can cause version mismatches with the webpack version used by @temporalio/worker.
proposedFix: Pass webpack object as second parameter to webpackConfigHook callback function alongside the current config parameter.
keyQuote: if we need to use things like `DefinePlugin`, the caller has to import webpack directly. This may cause issues as the caller may wrongly use a webpack version different from the one used by `@temporalio/worker`.
